entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 80 early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
